text:
Hello guys :slightly_smiling_face: I would love to know where you import your libraries. For example, when there's a slider module you are going to use many times within the same template, do you import slick-slider.js inside the module or in the general template?
Taking into consideration that:
• If i import it in the template, i won't be able to add the module to another flexible template that doesn't have that library
• If i import it inside the module, that file can be requested many times in one page and slow its load speed (Google pagespeed insights)
If you add slick carousel in linked file section and use that module many times on page it will load only one time in page…..
Hey all is anyone else experiencing issues renaming and moving files right now?
